title: Savage Lands v0.5.0
description:
FIXED:
Plenty of bug fixes (thanks to the community for finding and reporting these!)

    Resolved issue with the reading/writing of inventory items (or pickups) which was causing crashes and potentially damaging save files.
    Golden Reaver now has correct icon
    Stone House should no longer float in air when constructed
    Weapon rack in Argo should visually spawn weapons again
    Floating props in Argo no longer float
    Repair system changes:
        Items now correctly count down at the first sign of damage
        Items now correctly show how many materials are needed & how many are currently in inventory
        Text from "Required Components" to "Broken Components" when in repair.
        Bug that was restoring health to items from old players/worlds.



ADDED:
General:

    Mac OS, Linux and Steam OS Support added
    New UI element added to make corpse retrieval less frustrating
        When within 200+ meters of your corpse, a crossbones icon will appear on your screen!
    Repair system for weapons & armor implemented
        Accessed via new tab under Crafting menu
        Repairs can only be made after weapons & armor have 'broken'
        New camp added to the north of start location 1
        Torch now displays health on icon
        Torches should now burnout properly when held or on the ground


Crafting:

    Pike of Resurrection animation tuned to shake more slowly upon activation 


Creatures:

    Forest Giants now use a new trigger system to spawn
    Adjusted day/night skeletons that spawn around the Argo Dragon Tower


Environment:

    Two new additional abandoned camps have been added near Argo Dragon Tower
    Giant rocks pillars have been added in the center isle to help make the area more recognizable.
        These rock pillars have been removed from other areas of the island.


Equipment:

    Flesh Wrapped Hammer has a new gold texture for metal component
    Reckless Edge has been re-textured
    Ebon Steel Recipe revamped
    Ebon Steel Armor durability increased by 20 for all pieces
